title: DECORATIVE SURFACE COVERINGS AND METHODS FOR MAKING SAME
abstract: Decorative surface coverings comprise a multicolored, fused plastisol layer (25) comprising: (a) a fused plastisol composition of a first color (30); and (b) a fused plastisol composition of a second color (35), the second plastisol being distributed within the first colored plastisol such that the multicolored plastisol layer exhibits color gradients between the first (30) and second colored plastisols (35). According to certain aspects of the invention, the decorative surface covering products comprise a patterned solid plastisol mixture having a three-dimensional appearance. Methods for manufacturing such decorative surface coverings comprise the steps of (a) applying to a substrate (20) a coating of the first colored fluid plastisol (30); (b) distributing in the first colored fluid plastisol (30) a second colored fluid plastisol (35) to form a patterned plastisol mixture; and (c) forming the patterned fluid plastisol mixture into a patterned solid plastisol mixture (25).

motivations: There is a need for decorative surface coverings with unique, multicolored, and three-dimensional appearances.
Existing methods for creating decorative surface coverings may lack the ability to produce complex color gradients and patterns.
objectives: Develop decorative surface coverings comprising multicolored, fused plastisol layers with color gradients.
Create methods for manufacturing decorative surface coverings with three-dimensional appearances and patterned solid plastisol mixtures.
methods: Apply a coating of colored fluid plastisol to a substrate.
Distribute a second colored fluid plastisol within the first colored fluid plastisol to form a patterned plastisol mixture.
Form the patterned fluid plastisol mixture into a patterned solid plastisol mixture.
results: Produce decorative surface coverings with unique, multicolored, and three-dimensional appearances.
Achieve complex color gradients and patterns in decorative surface coverings.
llama_json.research_subject: Development of decorative surface coverings with multicolored plastisol layers

motivations: There is a need for decorative surface coverings with a multicolored, fused plastisol layer that exhibits color gradients.
Existing methods for creating decorative surface coverings with a three-dimensional appearance can be improved.
objectives: Create a decorative surface covering with a multicolored, fused plastisol layer that exhibits color gradients.
Develop a method for manufacturing decorative surface coverings with a three-dimensional appearance.
methods: Apply a coating of a first colored fluid plastisol to a substrate.
Distribute a second colored fluid plastisol within the first to form a patterned plastisol mixture.
Form the patterned fluid plastisol mixture into a patterned solid plastisol mixture.
results: Produce a decorative surface covering with a multicolored, fused plastisol layer that exhibits color gradients.
Achieve a patterned solid plastisol mixture with a three-dimensional appearance.
openai_json.research_subject: Creation and manufacturing of decorative surface coverings with multicolored, fused plastisol layers

motivations: There is a need for decorative surface coverings that exhibit enhanced visual appeal through multicolored patterns and three-dimensional appearances.
objectives: Develop decorative surface coverings with multicolored, fused plastisol layers that display color gradients and three-dimensional visual effects.
Create manufacturing methods for producing patterned plastisol mixtures with controlled color distribution.
methods: Apply a first colored fluid plastisol coating to a substrate.
Distribute a second colored fluid plastisol within the first to create a patterned mixture.
Transform the patterned fluid plastisol mixture into a solid form through fusion.
results: Production of decorative surface coverings featuring color gradients between different colored plastisols.
Achievement of three-dimensional visual appearance in the final patterned solid plastisol mixture.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Multicolored decorative surface coverings using fused plastisol compositions
